jd: From: Richa Mathur, Orbitpeople LLC richa.mathur@orbitpeople.com Reply to: richa.mathur@orbitpeople.com The following are the job details:Job title: Project ManagerLocation: San Francisco,CAJob type: Remote Job DescriptionManage a team of mid to senior level managers, solution consultants and leads.Collaborate with delivery managers on sprint planning, build and testing estimations, deployment and operational handoff to the support team.Collaborate with product managers and business SME to capture precise business requirements and provide guidance on solution roadmap.Collaborate with cross functional and technical team to deliver the solutionWhat are the top 3 skills required for this role? Min 4+ Years of experience in Project Management, PMP is must. Overall 12+ years’ experience.Experience managing Retail & Supply chain project is must.Experience building, leading teams, and managing large cross functional stake holders on enterprise scale projects and managing project finances including reviewing SOW/contract, forecasting are must.Prior project management experience with Apparel industry and experience in Sustainability Reporting is preferred.Experience in Hybrid project would be a plus.12+ years ( 4+ project management experience)
